short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refreshes the tab when DevTools are closed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically refreshes the active tab when the devtools are closed. This extension is useful for developers who need to refresh the page they are working on after making changes in the devtools.

It's advised to only run this extension for certain pages, e.g. localhost (see screenshot).
